name: Vita Consecrata
additionalNotes:
THIS VERSION OF "VITA CONSECRATA" IS A BRAND NEW BLEND AS OF 2/1/19 & HAS BEEN METICULOUSLY CRAFTED BY MASTER BLENDER CHRISTIAN EIROA, OWNER OF CLE CIGARS & ORIGINAL OWNER OF CAMACHO CIGARS. THEY ARE SUPERB!

Flavorful & spicy Corojo wrapper, well balanced with rustic earthy notes & exuberant bouquet.

6 inches long x 50 ring gauge, "Toro" size
